name: Modding tools for Cross Racing Championship Extreme
name_original: Modding tools for Cross Racing Championship Extreme
description:
These tools allow you to make your own addon cars, tracks and gamemodes for Cross Racing Championship.

PACKAGE CONTENTS


  • Plugins for 3ds max (Invictus shader, SCX export v4)
  • Scripts for 3ds max (SPL tools, pos/rotation tools, etc.)
  • Tutorials
  • Example gamemode sources
  • Example map
  • Resconvert for making .rpk files
  • Documentation files

These tools are provided as is, there's no official support for them. You need to have Cross Racing Championship Extreme in your Steam library for using the tools.
